articles.author: Mirian G.
articles.title: Opinion: At the border, my son was taken from me
articles.description: "I am proof that parents who are legally seeking asylum are being separated from their children for seemingly no reason," writes Mirian G., who came to the US from Honduras, and was separated from her 18-month-old child.

articles.title: Democratic Senate hopeful stumps across Rio Grande Valley
articles.description: MISSION — The senate candidate climbed onto the back of a John Deere Gator utility vehicle, crossed his legs and soon saw the start of federal construction he had no idea existed.

articles.author: Julia Preston
articles.title: ‘They Reached In and Tore Out a Piece of my Heart’
articles.description: On the border a father must choose between fighting for a new life and seeing his son again.

articles.author: WGN Web Desk
articles.title: Toddlers, babies held in ‘tender age’ facilities after separated from families
articles.description:
Trump administration officials have been sending babies and other young children forcibly separated from their parents at the U.S.-Mexico border to at least three "tender age" shelters in South Texas, The Associated Press has learned.
